app.title: EXP AI - Chatbot AI Asistant
app.description:
Hey! AI chat and text-to-photo models are united in one app for you. ChatGPT-4o, Gemini, LLama-3  API ChatBot and AI Art models similar to Midjourney, Dall-e, SDXL (Stable Diffusion) are ready to use with EXP AI, along with streams where you can get inspiration for your amazing photo illustrations!

Meet EXP AI, your Creative AI ChatGPT-4o API Chat AI Photo Drawing Assistant! EXP AI is an AI chat, text-to-photo, digital assistant app that helps you with a wide range of tasks, equipped with ChatGPT-4o API and technology similar to Midjourney, SDXL, Dall-e AI Art models. With expert knowledge and the ability to speak fast, EXP AI supports you in any activity you can think of, from essays and assignments to creative projects and social media posts. 

---EXP AI Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Advanced ChatGPT-4o API chat technology. 
- Advanced AI Photo generation technology similar to Midjourney, Dall-e, SDXL AI Art models. 
‚Ä¢ Use cases and templates. 
‚Ä¢ Unlimited questions and answers. 
‚Ä¢ Tools that you will use constantly in your daily life with AI Box.
‚Ä¢ Voice chat feature

„Äê ASK EVERYTHING „Äë

EXPAI provides support with assignments, creative projects, social media posts, recipes, horoscope comments, outfit ideas, email ideas, and anything else you can think of.

It can help you with many things, from coming up with a catchy phrase to creating an original melody and photo. Unleash your imagination with your creative and intelligent AI assistant and enjoy the limitless possibilities!

„Äê CREATE PHOTOS FROM TEXT WITH AI „Äë

Write down a photo of your dreams with EXP AI and create your art. Supported by many photography technologies, EXP AI also has the features of choosing the size and what style you want you to create of the photo you are going to create. Unleash your imagination, create amazing photos.

„ÄêALL TOOLS IN YOUR POCKET WITH AI BOX„Äë

Improve your photos by sharpening them with AI BOX developed by EXP AI. Take a photo of the questions you can't solve and instantly observe the AI solving the question. Translate for any language, correct grammar mistakes. For more, check out AI BOX from within the app.

„ÄêSPEAK FLOOD„Äë

With the voice chat feature, talk effortlessly with artificial intelligence and get voice answers.

„ÄêGET INSTANT REPLY„Äë

With EXPAI's powerful AI capabilities, quickly find answers to your pressing questions and get instant access to relevant information. Improve your decision-making and gain insights on the go. 

„Äê SPECIAL RECOMMENDATIONS „Äë

Elevate your business by getting suggestions and tips that fit your writing style and preferences. Develop yourself with curated input that aligns with your creative vision.

„ÄêINSPIRATION„Äë

With the inspiration section, get tips on how to create creative photos and create your art perfectly.

Says inappropriate content for completely harmless subject material. Refund requested within half hour. I'm not going to deal with this headache.

I will happily re- review your app if your staff is courteous and attentive enough to answer this question; I signed up a few weeks ago (I have approx 5 of each question credits)... I used them all immediately, and genuinely think it's a decent program for finding condensed info (TO FOCUS THE _START_ OF RESEARCH). However, despite gaining extra 3 cred a day for the entire first week (never using ALL, but at least a few every day); I suddenly have ZERO, and no way to get more... plz help!

Not generating anything. I pay for this and it worked great, now the last couple days it just won't generate any images. Just stays at the loading screen. Might change my rating after you fix this issue!

app.AIReview:
EXP AI - Chatbot AI Assistant Review

Overview

EXP AI ‚Äì Chatbot AI Assistant is an ambitious app aiming to consolidate several leading AI technologies into a single, accessible platform. Positioning itself as a ‚ÄúCreative AI ChatGPT-4o API Chat AI Photo Drawing Assistant,‚Äù it offers access to ChatGPT-4o, Gemini, Llama-3 via API chatbot functionality alongside image generation tools mimicking Midjourney, DALL-E, and SDXL (Stable Diffusion). With over 395,000 installs and a solid 4.41/5 rating based on 11,068 user reviews, EXP AI represents a significant effort to democratize access to advanced AI capabilities for both creative professionals and casual users. The core premise ‚Äì combining conversational AI with image generation ‚Äì is undeniably appealing, but the execution reveals areas needing refinement.

Key Features

The app‚Äôs feature set is undeniably broad, reflecting its multi-faceted approach:

  • ChatGPT-4o API Chatbot: Users can leverage the power of ChatGPT-4o for a variety of tasks ‚Äì brainstorming, content creation, research, and general conversation. This integration provides access to cutting-edge language model capabilities without requiring users to manage separate OpenAI accounts.
  • Gemini & Llama-3 API Integration: The app supports conversations with Google‚Äôs Gemini and Meta's Llama-3 models via their respective APIs, providing a comparative testing ground for different AI conversational styles.
  • AI Image Generation (Midjourney/DALL-E/SDXL): Users can generate images through text prompts using models inspired by popular image generators like Midjourney, DALL-E 2, and Stable Diffusion XL. This allows creative exploration without the complexities of directly managing those platforms.
  • Streams & Inspiration: A dedicated "streams" feature offers curated visual inspiration, potentially designed to jumpstart users' creativity when crafting prompts for the image generation tools. The app claims these streams provide ‚Äúamazing photo illustrations.‚Äù
  • Text-to-Photo Conversion: Beyond generating images from scratch, EXP AI facilitates converting text descriptions into visual representations ‚Äì a core functionality of many modern AI art applications.
  • Multi-Platform Support (Android & iOS): The app is available on both Android and iOS, broadening its potential user base.

Strengths

  • Accessibility of Powerful Models: The biggest strength of EXP AI lies in its ability to provide relatively easy access to sophisticated AI models like ChatGPT-4o, Gemini, and Llama-3 without requiring users to navigate complex API setups or pay for individual subscriptions. This lowers the barrier to entry considerably.
  • Combined Functionality: The integration of chat and image generation within a single app offers significant convenience. Users can seamlessly transition between generating an image based on a conversational prompt and refining it through further dialogue with the AI.
  • Large User Base & Positive Rating: The high number of installs (395,178) and the strong rating (4.41/5) indicate that EXP AI has resonated with a large segment of users. This suggests that the core functionality is delivering value for many individuals.
  • Free to Use: The app's free tier makes it accessible to anyone interested in experimenting with these technologies, removing financial constraints as an initial hurdle.

Areas for Improvement

  • API Dependency & Reliability: Reliance on external APIs (ChatGPT-4o, Gemini, etc.) introduces a critical dependency. Downtime or changes within those API services will directly impact EXP AI‚Äôs functionality. The app doesn't appear to have robust offline capabilities.
  • Image Generation Quality Variance: While the image generation models mimic popular tools, the quality of outputs can be inconsistent. Users may find themselves needing to refine prompts extensively to achieve desired results ‚Äì a common challenge with many AI art generators. More granular control over parameters like seed values and sampling methods would be beneficial.
  • Stream Content & Relevance: The ‚ÄúStreams‚Äù feature requires significant improvement in terms of content quality and relevance. Currently, the descriptions suggest they are simply curated images; providing insightful context or educational elements related to artistic techniques would greatly enhance their value.
  • User Interface Clutter: The app‚Äôs interface feels somewhat cluttered due to the sheer number of features crammed into a single screen. A more streamlined design prioritizing core functionalities would improve usability.
  • Prompt Engineering Guidance: The app lacks robust guidance for prompt engineering, which is crucial for effectively utilizing AI image generators. Providing templates or tutorials on crafting effective prompts could significantly improve user outcomes.

User Experience

The initial onboarding process is straightforward, guiding users through the basic features. However, navigating the multiple tabs and options can feel overwhelming, particularly for new users. The chat interface within ChatGPT-4o feels slightly less refined compared to dedicated ChatGPT apps ‚Äì there's a noticeable delay between typing and receiving responses. Image generation prompts require careful consideration as the app doesn‚Äôt offer extensive pre-built templates or prompt starters beyond the "Streams." User feedback highlights that some API connection issues lead to frustrating periods of inactivity.

Value for Money

As a free application, EXP AI offers considerable value for casual experimentation with advanced AI technologies. However, users who require consistent high-quality image generation or rely heavily on ChatGPT-4o‚Äôs capabilities will likely find themselves limited by the free tier's constraints and potentially needing to explore alternative paid solutions. The app‚Äôs true value lies in its ability to act as a gateway for individuals wanting to dip their toes into AI without significant financial investment.

Conclusion

EXP AI ‚Äì Chatbot AI Assistant represents an ambitious project attempting to consolidate powerful AI tools into one convenient application. Its accessibility and combined functionality are definite strengths, driving the impressive install numbers and positive ratings. However, reliance on external APIs, inconsistent image generation quality, a cluttered UI, and lack of prompt engineering guidance represent significant areas needing improvement. While valuable as a free entry point for exploring AI, users should be aware of its limitations before relying on it for professional creative work. The app has potential, but requires focused development to truly realize its vision and become a standout player in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.
